argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ipid.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | ipid.6 | |- N = ( normCV ` U ) |
| 3 |  | ipid.7 | |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_ipidsq | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A P A ) = ( ( N ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( sqrt ` ( A P A ) ) = ( sqrt ` ( ( N ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_nvcl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_nvge0 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> 0 <_ ( N ` A ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sqrtsqd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( sqrt ` ( ( N ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( sqrt ` ( A P A ) ) ) |
